title: Hidden Symmetry of the Yang--Coulomb System
abstract: The bound system composed of the Yang monopole coupled to a particle of the isospin by the SU(2) and Coulomb interaction is considered. The generalized Runge--Lenz vector and the SO(6) group of hidden symmetry are established. It is also shown that the group of hidden symmetry make it possible to calculate the spectrum of the system by a pure algebraic method.
